name: The Coolest Budget-friendly Places to Visit While in Manila
description: The trip will start with me by picking you up in any place at Manila. Then afterwards, we will commute all the way to Recto then to Quiapo. What's so special about this trip is you will experience the daily routines of a typical local filipino. You will be able to go check out the awesome stuff you will find in these places and also experience the fun and highlights of Manila.
